channel.title: General Blogs Hosting Watershiporg on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Blogs Hosting Watershiporg on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Watership.org blogs
item.description: I have been hosting blogs for my friends for quite awhile. Its a lot of fun. I love reading them and trying to get them to blog more. It is a neat way to learn about people and see what they have been up to without being constantly in touch. It is especially good for friends that are away or travel and all that. So I starting hosting peoples blogs using greymatter.
